name: Pure-Stat Baseball: Stadium Disk
overview: Pure-Stat College Baseball is a sports simulation that allows player to replay individual games or entire baseball seasons, from the past or present, while keeping a permanent record of your team's stats using the built in Stat Compiler. In this simulation. The player can relive 8 major Major League Baseball teams from the 1927 New York Yankees to the 1976 Cincinnati Reds. This Add-on disk, requires the original release. Side A: 12 National League Stadiums & 10 Classic Teams. Side B: 14 American League Stadiums.
